Total.tooltip: Total power for this power group in this scenario

Leakage.tooltip: Leakage power for this power group in this scenario

Internal.tooltip: Internal power for this power group in this scenario.  If glitch power column is shown, this column includes all internal power except glitch.

Switching.tooltip: Switching power for this power group in this scenario.  If glitch power column is shown, this column includes all switching power except glitch.

%PwrGroup.tooltip: For this scenario, the percentage of total power contributed by this power group
